title: Beautiful Fully Furnished Short Term Rental
posting_body: Short term month to month fully furnished home by St Rose Parkway.
Intended for someone working short term in the area or anyone who needs short term housing.
All utilities paid by the owner and home has high speed internet.
Community has sparking pool and playgrounds for the kids.
Employment verification and credit approval required on application.
Please reply with email explaining your situation and why you are interested in this rental.
